title: 【Upgraded】KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids, Electronic Light-up Dance Pad with Wireless Bluetooth 5 Speeds 9 Levels, Dancing Mat for Toddlers Music Game Dance Toy for Girls Boys 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 10+ Year Old
descriptions:
Introducing the 【Upgraded】KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids – the ultimate music game dance toy for your little ones! This extra-large electronic light-up dance pad is perfect for toddlers, boys, and girls aged 3-12 years old. With its upgraded Bluetooth 5 connectivity, easily pair this dance mat with smartphones or other Bluetooth-enabled devices to play music and let your child show off their dance moves!

The KIZJORYA Dance Mat offers 5 speeds and 9 difficulty levels to challenge and entertain your child for hours. Choose from three exciting modes – Free Dance, Memory, or Bluetooth – and watch as the LED score display keeps track of their progress. Adjust the volume with ease using the built-in volume keys, and enjoy the convenience of no weight restrictions.

Safety is our top priority, which is why this dance mat is made from high-quality, non-toxic, odorless, and waterproof vinyl. The soft, cushioned surface and non-slip silicone particles on the base ensure a safe and comfortable dance experience for your child. Plus, at 39x41 inches, the extra-large size provides ample space for your little dancer to showcase their skills.

This dance mat makes the perfect gift for any occasion, including Christmas, birthdays, and Children's Day. Not only is it a fun and engaging toy, but it also helps improve observational skills and enhances physical coordination.

Please note that 4 AA batteries are required (not included). Don't wait – order the 【Upgraded】KIZJORYA Dance Mat for Kids today and watch your child's face light up with joy as they dance their way to fun and fitness!
